title: [Boreas Hills, Sundowner Way]
description: Slate stairs set into the mountain lead up to the ridge above, while an iron railing gives those venturing upwards something to hold onto.  Several thanot trees grow nearby, ivy winding their way around them and eventually up onto the railing.

Slate stairs set into the mountain lead up to the ridge above, while an iron railing gives those venturing upwards something to hold onto.  A few lamps have been hung from the railing to provide lighting for the stairs.  Several thanot trees grow nearby, ivy winding their way around them and eventually up onto the railing.
